title: Initialize project structure and dependencies
progressNotes: # Ralph Progress Log  This file tracks the progress and learnings from Ralph iterations. Each completed task should add an entry here for future reference.  ## Recent Iterations  <!-- Ralph will append progress entries here automatically -->  ## SETUP-001: Initialize Project Structure and Dependencies  **Date:** 2026-01-18  **Changes Made:** - Fixed `.opencode/.gitignore` to properly track `package.json` and `bun.lock` files (previously incorrectly excluded) - Verified and confirmed all npm dependencies are installed in `.opencode/`   - `@opencode-ai/plugin@1.1.25` installed and verified - Ensured project structure follows AGENTS.md conventions:   - `tests/` directory exists for test files   - `docs/` directory exists for documentation   - Configuration files in project root   - Skills organized in `skills/` directory - Generated `package-lock.json` for reproducible dependency installation  **Dependencies Verified:** - npm packages installed: 4 packages audited, 0 vulnerabilities - Node modules properly populated in `.opencode/node_modules/`  **Status:** Completed successfully  ## Patterns Discovered  - Always check for existing patterns in AGENTS.md before implementing new features - Prefer established libraries and frameworks already used in the project - Follow the existing code style and naming conventions - Test thoroughly before marking tasks complete  ## Common Issues Resolved  <!-- Document solutions to problems encountered during development -->  ## Performance Optimizations  <!-- Track performance improvements and best practices discovered -->
